entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning then snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
